sentences.sContent: Those under suspicion can also wield supreme power over their potential accusers, or be in charge of allocating funding to their projects or institutions.
sentences.sContent_eng: Those under suspicion can also wield supreme power over their potential accusers, or be in charge of allocating funding to their projects or institutions.
sentences.sCn: 那些被怀疑的人也会向那些潜在的指控者挥舞权力的大棒，或者掌管着为后者及其单位分配经费。
